name: Mental Models Reference
tagline: A collection of mental models used by Charlie Munger, as shared by Tren Griffin
body:
#About This Reference
[Mental models] (https://www.farnamstreetblog.com/mental-models/) are "the big ideas from the big disciplines: physics, biology, psychology, philosophy, literature, sociology, history, and a few others." These foundational concepts help to explain the world around us and make us better thinkers.

This list is compiled from Tren Griffin's list of models [here] (http://25iq.com/2015/08/22/a-dozen-things-ive-learned-from-charlie-munger-about-mental-models-and-worldly-wisdom/). Each model is described with a Wikipedia introduction level of specificityâ€”indeed, most definitions will reference Wikipedia unless otherwise stated. I will then note any additional relevant thoughts around each model, as well as a musing or two on how it could be applicable beyond business and investing to knowledge work more broadly.

Please add your commentary! I would love for this to be a "living list" of concepts that benefit from multiple perspectives.


#The Models

###Accounting
* [Balance Sheet] (https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/Balance-Sheet.md)
* [Cash Flow Statement] (https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/Cash-Flow-Statement.md)
* [Depreciation] (https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/Depreciation.md)
* [Double-Entry] (<https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/Double-Entry.md)
* [Generally Accepted Accounting Principles] (https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/GAAP.md)
* [Income Statement] (https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/Income-Statement.md)
* [Sunk Cost] (https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/Sunk-Cost.md)

###Biology
* [Genetics] (https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/Genetics.md)
* [Natural Selection] (https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/Natural-Selection.md)
* [Physiology] (https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/Physiology.md)

###Business
* [Moats] (https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/Moat.md)
* [Five Forces] (https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/Five-Forces.md)
* [Brand] (https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/Brand.md)

###Chemistry
* [Autocatalytic Reaction] (https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/Autocatalytic-Reaction.md)
* [Bohr Model] (https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/Bohr-model.md)
* [Kinetics] (https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/Kinetics.md)
* [Thermodynamics] (https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/Thermodynamics.md)
* [Uncertainty Principle] (https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/Uncertainty-Principle.md)
* [Viscosity] (https://github.com/lloyd2nd/Munger-s-Mental-Models/blob/master/Viscosity.md)
